  include(${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/ensmallen.cmake)
endif()
if(BUILD_DLIB_LIB)
  include(${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/dlib.cmake)
endif()
include(${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/boost_graph.cmake)

  include(${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/googletest.cmake)
endif()
